channel.title: Project Dark-Evolution!
channel.description:
[size=15pt]Welcome to the Dark-Evolution Development Topic![/size]
[b][size=15pt]THIS ISN'T A RECRUITMENT![/size][/b]
[size=10pt]My Goals for Dark-Evolution.
Ok, I have to be honest, I am pretty crap at coding.
[size=10pt][size=10pt][/size][/size]The reason for this project is for me to [b]LEARN[/b] I learn by doing things, I don't want to read thousands of pages of Java tutorials. So please, if I ever need help, be nice and help me. :P
- Short Term - - 3 different training areas [Low, Medium, High ]with a variety of monsters and requirements to go there - LOTS of drops from monsters - this is to create an economy. - Add more to slayer, more monsters and drops. - Edit Shops - Make sure that there are only basic items in the shops, no items like rares, barrows etc.[/size] - Minigames, not sure what type, but yeah you'll get items from them
This is all I have for now.
[size=10pt]- Long Term - -A very well coded dungeon with a variety of monsters with [b]VERY[/b] rare drops and high requirements. -My own client, or at least a client with my name on it :P haha ^^ -Somewhat full magic, with splashing and real bonuses against defence [/size]
[b]Progress[/b] What I'm currently working on...
- 3 different training areas [Low, Medium, High ]with a variety of monsters and requirements to go there
Low Training Area - [][][][][][][][] 80% - All Monsters added - Needs drops and proper attack emotes.
Medium Training Area - [][][][][][][][][] 5% - Found a spot, added portal, needs monsters added, drops and proper attack emotes.
High Training Area - [][][][][][][][][] 5% - Found a spot, added portal, bank, needs monsters added, drops and proper attack emotes.
----------------------------------------------------------------
[b]So, How long will all this take ?[/b]
[size=10pt]Well, I have school on at the moment, so I don't have a whole ton of time each day. I will probably work on this for a few months, it really depends what I learn, and how fast I learn it, and if you guys are willing to give me ideas and support. :) [/size]
[b][u][size=10pt]IDEAS[/size][/u][/b]
Well I want to release something that people want, not something they don't want and wont use. At this stage I am not sure if I'm going to host it, I might just release it, I might get a dedicate or find someone.
Hosting it myself will probably be a bit of trouble, but I can give it a shot.
- - - - - - -
[b]That's all for now really, I will add to this tomorrow. Please post your ideas and what you think. :) Please don't say stuff like ' oh ur only 17 rep ur a noob ur neva gunna get close to finishing '
Thank-you for reading. :)[/b]
Well, I've got a starter area that I'll be willing to show you :P I like it, and it's a good place to base my server.
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img181.imageshack.us/img181/9238/startareamq3.png[/img][/URL]
It's a dwarf town, dunno what it's called though

*quick edit forgot to put in some ideas
umm i think the dungeon covers all my ideas but an idea for the dungeon make a multiple way dungeon so like
if you go left you will be vsing stuff like hellhounds so on and at the end you vs a kbd? *just ideas
go right you vs the tokul guys
so on so on

item.title: Project Dark-Evolution!
item.dc:creator: @x0_0wn x0 0wn
item.description:
@x0_0wn wrote:

[size=15pt]Welcome to the Dark-Evolution Development Topic![/size]

[size=15pt]THIS ISN’T A RECRUITMENT![/size]

[size=10pt]My Goals for Dark-Evolution.

Ok, I have to be honest, I am pretty crap at coding.

[size=10pt][size=10pt][/size][/size]The reason for this project is for me to LEARN
I learn by doing things, I don’t want to read thousands of pages of Java tutorials.
So please, if I ever need help, be nice and help me.

  • Short Term -
  • 3 different training areas [Low, Medium, High ]with a variety of monsters and requirements to go there
  • LOTS of drops from monsters - this is to create an economy.
  • Add more to slayer, more monsters and drops.
  • Edit Shops - Make sure that there are only basic items in the shops, no items like rares, barrows etc.[/size]
  • Minigames, not sure what type, but yeah you’ll get items from them

This is all I have for now.

[size=10pt]- Long Term -
-A very well coded dungeon with a variety of monsters with VERY rare drops and high requirements.
-My own client, or at least a client with my name on it haha ^^
-Somewhat full magic, with splashing and real bonuses against defence
[/size]

Progress
What I’m currently working on…

  • 3 different training areas [Low, Medium, High ]with a variety of monsters and requirements to go there

Low Training Area - [][][][][][][][] 80% - All Monsters added - Needs drops and proper attack emotes.

Medium Training Area - [][][][][][][][][] 5% - Found a spot, added portal, needs monsters added, drops and proper attack emotes.

High Training Area - [][][][][][][][][] 5% - Found a spot, added portal, bank, needs monsters added, drops and proper attack emotes.

So, How long will all this take ?

[size=10pt]Well, I have school on at the moment, so I don’t have a whole ton of time each day.
I will probably work on this for a few months, it really depends what I learn, and how fast I learn it, and if you guys are willing to give me ideas and support.
[/size]

[size=10pt]IDEAS[/size]

Well I want to release something that people want, not something they don’t want and wont use.
At this stage I am not sure if I’m going to host it, I might just release it, I might get a dedicate or find someone.

Hosting it myself will probably be a bit of trouble, but I can give it a shot.

[b]That’s all for now really, I will add to this tomorrow.
Please post your ideas and what you think.
Please don’t say stuff like ’ oh ur only 17 rep ur a noob ur neva gunna get close to finishing ’

Thank-you for reading. :)[/b]

Well, I’ve got a starter area that I’ll be willing to show you
I like it, and it’s a good place to base my server.

It’s a dwarf town, dunno what it’s called though
